message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
I understand that $1000000 is a significant discount from your initial offer, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1050000. Can we meet at this price?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1080000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1060000. Can we meet at this price?
